title: When you look back at your first game with your main

replies.body: Oh damn you played with Annie Bot in your first games, what a MMR beast.
That was my first game of league of legends! Veigar was free and I was under the assumption that I just needed to not die. {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

http://m.imgur.com/gallery/swybKSx?Noredirect 
Tank Draven seemed like a great idea back then
http://gifrific.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/08/no-words-homer-into-brush.gif

When you main garen
https://thegamefreakshow.files.wordpress.com/2015/09/2941760-lfs10.png?w=306&h=306&crop=1

Jk pls don't downvote me

No... I'm not going to downvote you... I might purge your filth from this land with the Holy Light of Demacia, but I won't downvote you.
http://i.imgur.com/W0wVY4c.gif?Noredirect

http://i.imgur.com/gQgMwVv.png

Well, it could've been worse.

https://gyazo.com/0680f61a2aef429fb17df3e28b31ed50.png?nodirect
My second and first games.  (First is the bottom one)

I am honestly not sure which one I should be more sad about.  

At least it wasn't my first Ezreal game
https://gyazo.com/db77f981f12786dbfa63b3ef060afef1.png

I uhh... need to go reflect on my life decisions real quick.
How the hell did you found your first games? :O
https://i.imgflip.com/1940tq.jpg

Ye but it goes just back to 2014 and I started back in 2012.

I remember my 1st game was Cassiopeia duo top with Sejuani hahahahaha xD

Well... It couldn't have been too bad...

http://imgur.com/a/scZyY

Oh wait... yes it can!

http://i.imgur.com/LBpSANb.gif?Noredirect

I remember my first Rumble game.

{{item:2045}} is a good item on him, right?
http://i.imgur.com/PijcGEU.gif?Noredirect
Is that a bad build? That actually seems pretty reasonable to me... Course I don't ever play Rumble.
Crystaline Bracer, Catlyst and Ninja Tabi.... And somewhat Abyssal...

With all that health and his shield getting some resistances in the form of tabi and abyssal seems alright if you're going for a tankier AP bruiser kinda build.... Kinda forgot he was manaless though so the catalyst does make a lot less sense XD
Except... you don't go tank on Rumble!
This actually looks like a decent Rumble build until you get to the Crystaline Bracer.
Crystaline Bracer, Catlyst and Ninja Tabi.... And somewhat Abyssal...
Abyssal is by no means a bad item on Rumble. It's the only item for him to get AP and magic resistance, and he consistently gets close enough to use the passive.

{{champion:31}} {{item:3101}} {{item:3101}} {{item:3101}} {{item:3101}} {{item:3101}} {{item:3101}} 

''maxing E is OP'' (and i would wait full gold to buy them instead of going with parts then upward)  = ( i wouldnt upgrade to nashors cause i liked blue better) good old days

http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/1932616254/230343476?tab=overview

Well would you look at that

{{champion:22}} {{item:3006}} {{item:3006}} {{item:3006}} {{item:3006}} {{item:3006}} {{item:3006}} 

Luckily someone told me about Infinity Edge

{{champion:54}} {{item:3068}} {{item:3068}} {{item:3068}} {{item:3068}} {{item:3068}} {{item:3068}} 

I'm looking at these items and I'm saying to myself, "Ok, if I buy 6 of these, I'll have 3000 health, 300 armor, and at lvl 18, I'll deal 258 dmg per sec. Fuck yeah this is a great build."

My entire world was turned upside down when I found out that Unique passives don't stack.

He's not my main persay but I like to play him a lot to counter Rivens.
Yeah, I remember building multiple boots because I wanted to go fast, and multiple hunter's machetes as I wanted to deal more damage to the dragon.
I believe the earliest I can go is season 3..... I can't find anything out of season 2 probably because the data system was different back there

not my main but i had to share this
https://i.gyazo.com/473e9bf0a5936f21a446d399ba609167.png

He's a caster. He does damage with his abilities. Obviously he needs ability power.
~Logic of probably most new players and you can't blame them.

https://postimg.org/image/3uvgh9nah/

Oh, Jesus why

ggez yi op q r penta kill
https://gyazo.com/e5666217fbd9180875aaee627fce7f1c.jpg

Only goes back to season 4 and I started in season 2, but I imagine it was standard builds at the time since I had an easy strategy in mind:

{{champion:103}} Copy Reginald
{{champion:67}} Copy Doublelift
{{champion:57}} Copy TheOddOne

At this point I had been playing long enough to know that I didn't quite understand builds, so I found people who did and mimicked their champ pools, builds, masteries, even playstyles.  

Yeah I'm boring.

https://media.giphy.com/media/l41lV04RvMyCysJX2/giphy.gif

Edit: Now that I think about it, I remember playing almost exclusively Teemo top from level 5 - 21 or so before I started branching out, and I remember my build looking something like this:  Malady, Nashor's Tooth, Berserker Grieves, Wit's End, Frozen Mallet, Madred's Bloodrazor.  I can't honestly tell you how I did, but it seemed like it was fine at the time.
The first item I ever built was witts end and I haven't built it since
I stopped building Wit's End when it stopped dealing 42 damage. It just lost it's charm after that.

Not my first game but one of my first real 5v5 games


{{champion:81}} "Annie, why do you have a wriggler's lantern?"

{{champion:1}} "For more attack speed, duh. I need to attack faster to do more damage."

{{champion:77}}  5/2/3 items: Feral Flare, frozen Mallet, Spirit Stone, Attack speed boots with Alacrity enchant. Zeal
7/30/2014

not my first game, but the oldest I could find

I would check but... I don't have 10 minutes to scroll through all my Udyr games.
but I do remember it, top against jax... rip.

http://imgur.com/X8f1ccn.png

Thats as far back as it goes. It doesnt go back to 2012 when I started :/

If only I could go back so far in Match History to see my first game, would love to see how it was.

EDIT: Nevermind, didn,t know the Website had this feature. 
http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/1366228773/43527571?tab=overview
